trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to display when the activity associated with the designer cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um glifo para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser exibido quando a atividade associada com o designer não pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer displays <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph> when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade exibe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph> quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo é associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se o glifo aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites para o glifo no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="designer" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="designer" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para executar tarefas de preenchimento e de desenho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o glifo aparece na superfície de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> a ser usado para acessar configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> do qual obter informações sobre ações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas necessárias para renderizar o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração de prioridade do glifo na superfície de design de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph" /> on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa a configuração de prioridade para a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph" /> na superfície de design de atividade.
